comment:
* Represents an activity-level event that is not associated with a session.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: TYPE_ACTIVITY_STARTED
variables.comment:
* TODO: change to public field. * The activity was started. * *

There are some reason, ACTIVITY_START cannot be added into UsageStats. We don't depend on * UsageEvents for Activity start. *

* * @hide

methods.name: public ActivityId getActivityId()
methods.comment: * Gets the ActivityId of the activity associated with the event.

methods.name: public ComponentName getComponentName()
methods.comment: * Gests the {@link ComponentName} of the activity associated with the event.

methods.name: public int getEventType()
methods.comment:
* Gets the event type.
     *
     * @return either {@link #TYPE_ACTIVITY_RESUMED}, {@value #TYPE_ACTIVITY_PAUSED},
     * {@value #TYPE_ACTIVITY_STOPPED}, {@value #TYPE_ACTIVITY_DESTROYED} or 10000 if the Activity
     * was started.

methods.name: public static String getTypeAsString(@ActivityEventType int type)
public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel parcel, int flags)

methodNames: public static String getTypeAsString(@ActivityEventType int type)
public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel parcel, int flags)
